title: Brad Arnold, Singer of 3 Doors Down, Passes Away
summary: Brad Arnold, the lead singer of the rock band 3 Doors Down, has died at age 47 after fighting cancer. The band announced this sad news on social media. He was a founding member and helped create popular songs like Kryptonite and Here Without You. In May 2025, he shared that he had kidney cancer that spread to his lung, and he had to cancel a tour. Brad was known for his talent, kindness, and love for his family and friends. He is survived by his wife, Jennifer. The band became famous in the 2000s with hits that many people enjoyed on the radio.
